Summary: The object I observed was coming east, then banked a 180 degree turn, then going west. When the object made this incredible turn, it revealed its shape. The object was clearly triangular and had white lights at each point. It proceeded W. at speedsunknown
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from my brothers house when I pulled on my street I saw this object right in front of me it was coming at me going East it then made a hard 180 degree bank it then revealed its shape it was trianglar shaped and had three lights at each point. The lights were bright white in color. It also seemed to have some kind of lighting pattern. The way in which this object effortlessly made this turn was nothing I had ever seen. It seemed like the object was effortlessly moving. But after the hard turn it was gone in a matter of second. The object had no sound, nor left any exhaut trail. I believe I saw a ufo. This sighting occured on October 31, 2013 at approx 10 p.m.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There was one other sighting in Detroit on or around October 31st 2013
